channel.title: Client Window Look and feel option? [TOPIC SOLVED]
channel.description: I can remember a long time ago I found out that you can change the look a;nd feel value to something so it looks like a normal Application window does anyone know where it is so i can change it I thought it was in applet_sub1 or Frame_sub1 or something which one is it?
